typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "User not listed in OCN Registry"

arguments.value: User not listed in OCN Registry

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "User not listed in OCN Registry"

nodes.documentation:
Adds business user, allowing participation in FCR market. 
Can be relayed by any entity: the business user only needs to sign their wallet address.
NOTE: might need to be modified (DID subject and OCN Registry party could be same entities with different keys)
nodes.name: addUser

nodes.documentation:
Adds device, allowing participation in FCR market.
Can be relayed by any entity: the business user only needs to sign
the device address, unique identifier and its own user address
nodes.name: addDevice
